function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of brand recognition and recall can lead to decreased customer loyalty and market share.","Impact":"Decreased market share, lower customer loyalty, and reduced brand value.","Mitigation":"Invest in brand awareness campaigns, engage in product placement strategies, and focus on creating memorable brand experiences.","Technologies":"Social media marketing, influencer marketing, and brand tracking software.","People":"Consumers, potential customers, and target audience.","Owner":"Marketing teams, brand managers, and advertising agencies."}]}
